articles.description: Florida Atlantic's trip to the men's Final Four has seemingly surprised everyone -- except the team.
articles.content: BOCA RATON, Fla. -- At the end of their first practice back at home after breaking brackets in the men's NCAA basketball tournament, members of the Florida Atlantic University men's team gathered aro… [+7101 chars]
